knimeNode.name: Add Time
knimeNode.shortDescription: Adds time information to a date cell.

fullDescription.intro: Adds a fixed time to cells which only contain a date. Optionally a fixed time zone can be added, too.

tab.name: Column Selection
tab.option: Only to the included columns a time will be added.

tab.name: Replace/Append Selection
tab.option: The selected columns will be appended to the input table. The suffix of the appended columns can be provided in the text field to the right.
The selected columns will be replaced by the new columns.

tab.name: Add Time
tab.option: If checked, a fixed time zone will be added.
If Add time zone is checked, the user can choose the time zone here.
